question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 90 years. Michael's father saw the Comet when he was 46 years old. Michael saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was Michael when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Michael saw the Comet for the second time when he was 46 years * 2= <<46*2=92>>92 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 90 years, so Michael saw the comet for the first time when he was 92 years - 90 years = <<92-90=2>>2 years old.
#### 2
